title: Pattern Matching with Switch
description: Create a function that uses pattern matching to describe different data types.
instructions:
1. Create a function `describe(Object value)` that returns a String
2. Use switch expression with patterns to handle: integers (positive/negative/zero), strings (empty/short/long), lists (empty/single/multiple), and a default case
3. Test with various inputs

hints.text: Use 'when' for guard conditions in patterns
Order matters - put specific cases before general ones
Use '...' for rest patterns in lists

commonMistakes.mistake: Putting general patterns before specific ones
commonMistakes.correction: Put 'int n when n < 0' before 'int n'
Use => for expression bodies in switch expressions
